original_text: So I spoke to the people in the morning, and at evening my wife died. And on the next morning I did as I was commanded.
korean_text: 내가 아침에 백성에게 말하였더니 저녁에 내 아내가 죽었으므로 아침에 내가 받은 명령대로 행하매

sentences.original_text: So I spoke to the people in the morning
and at evening my wife died.
I did as I was commanded.
